system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision radio peer. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_radio_peer_i.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Status report
f_peers../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_peerspeers: FalseLINKED_LIST [attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface] -- List of all radio items in the group Current is in. local cur, wid_obj, l_null: FalsePOINTER peer_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP l_interface: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface do create Result.Falsemake if ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group = l_null or else ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group) = l_null then Result.Falseextend (../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) else from cur := ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group until cur = l_null loop wid_obj := ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (cur) if wid_obj /= Falsedefault_pointer then peer_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_eif_object_from_ceif_object_from_c (wid_obj) if peer_imp /= Void then l_interface ?= peer_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface check l_interface /= Void then end Result.Falseextend (l_interface) end end cur := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gslist_struct_nextgslist_struct_next (cur) end end end
f_selected_peer../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_selected_peerselected_peer: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface -- Radio item that is currently selected. local cur, wid_obj, l_null: FalsePOINTER peer_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP l_result: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group = l_null or else ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group) = l_null then Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface else from cur := ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group until cur = l_null or else l_result /= Void loop wid_obj := ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (cur) if wid_obj /= l_null then peer_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_eif_object_from_ceif_object_from_c (../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (cur)) if peer_imp /= Void and then peer_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_radio_peer_i.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected then l_result ?= peer_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end end cur := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gslist_struct_nextgslist_struct_next (cur) end check l_result /= Void then end Result := l_result end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_eif_object_from_c../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_eif_object_from_ceif_object_from_c (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER): detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP deferred end
f_c_object../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object: FalsePOINTER deferred end
f_visual_widget../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget: FalsePOINTER deferred end
f_widget_object../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (a_list: FalsePOINTER): FalsePOINTER -- Returns c_object relative to a_list data. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gslist_struct_datagslist_struct_data (a_list) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group: FalsePOINTER -- Reference to front of radio group. *GSList. deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_radio_peer.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP
